fehd.ADR_TC: 九龍金巴利道39,41,43及43A號 2樓(主要部份)

geocode_en.formatted_address: 39 Kimberley Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 香港尖沙咀金巴利道39號

result.adr_address: 39 Kimberley Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 39 Kimberley Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.name: The Luxe Manor

reviews.text: A quirky and fantastic place to stay.  The rooms are nicely sized for Hong Kong and the showers are nice with great water pressure. Friendly and helpful staff.  A great breakfast buffet which was included in the price (an amazingly good breakfast given what other places charge for their buffets).   The coffee at breakfast was great.  I found it was cheapest to book directly with the hotel and not through third part sites. I'd recommend asking for a room that is not on the back side of the hotel. The street can be a bit noisy given all the restaurants with patio seating back there.

Comfortable, roomy (by Hong Kong) standards in a great location.  Our room was very clean and nicely refreshed daily.  We weren’t expecting much of a view and we didn’t get one.  But that’s OK. 

The buffet is really good with a wide variety including specialty coffee. We ate there for a week and never got tired of it. 

I only had one issue. We met friends at our hotel and were going to enjoy a $15 bottle of wine.  But the hotel wanted about $30 corking fee to consume it any of the public area. 

Despite this, it’s an overall good value.
Perfect location. Exceptional staff. Stunning decor. Wheelchair friendly. K4 bus to Airport Express.

Really nice hotel. Room is big (compare to other I’ve stayed at HK), bright with really pretty design. Bathroom is convenient. Room service is good and not disturbing. Stayed on 11th floor. No view, some building reconstruction, but I didn’t care for it. It was not giving noise and that’s all that matters. Really good breakfast for any taste.
Very convenient location. Subway not far. A lot of shops and cafe. 
Staff is helpful and friendly. 
Will stay here next time for sure.

Stayed here for 4 nights and loved everything about it. Right from check in we were treated to an upgrade and it just got better from there. Room was clean, shower pressure good, buffet breakfast included in room cost and location is close to many restaurants and shops aswell as public transport. Also received 2 cakes while staying here so kindly left in our room by the staff for my birthday and honeymoon celebration. Would definitely stay here again

reviews.text: 참 예쁘고 아기자기하고 친절한 부틱호텔 .. 쳇크인도 빠르고 편하게 잘되어이있다 룸은 예쁘고 깨끗하나 작아서 트렁크 놓기가 애매하며 욕실이 별로다 샤워부스가 그냥 방수커텐으로 되어있어서 샤워할때마다 몸에 커텐이 달라붙는다 아침 조식은 종류가 다양하게 잘나오는편이다 위치도 나쁘지않다

A quirky and fantastic place to stay.  The rooms are nicely sized for Hong Kong and the showers are nice with great water pressure. Friendly and helpful staff.  A great breakfast buffet which was included in the price (an amazingly good breakfast given what other places charge for their buffets).   The coffee at breakfast was great.  I found it was cheapest to book directly with the hotel and not through third part sites. I'd recommend asking for a room that is not on the back side of the hotel. The street can be a bit noisy given all the restaurants with patio seating back there.
金巴利道的重點特色酒店，私隱度好高，酒店格局也東歐路線，當然最重要就係十分之方便，無論食，玩，飲，都在四方面包圍著，價錢亦晤算過份，久不久帶著自己的最愛去重温愛意，係好的選擇，thx 。

Comfortable, roomy (by Hong Kong) standards in a great location.  Our room was very clean and nicely refreshed daily.  We weren’t expecting much of a view and we didn’t get one.  But that’s OK. 

The buffet is really good with a wide variety including specialty coffee. We ate there for a week and never got tired of it. 

I only had one issue. We met friends at our hotel and were going to enjoy a $15 bottle of wine.  But the hotel wanted about $30 corking fee to consume it any of the public area. 

Despite this, it’s an overall good value.
Perfect location. Exceptional staff. Stunning decor. Wheelchair friendly. K4 bus to Airport Express.
